Class AuthClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackdoor.auth.AuthClient
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class AuthClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    kAG0 API for a remote client to authenticate, add, remove or modify users in a database

      • removeUser

        public boolean removeUser(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String authUserName,
                          java.lang.String authPassword)
        Deprecated. 
        Remove user with userName. only users with REMOVE rights may remove users, however users may remove themselves without remove rights.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        authUserName - authUserName should be the same as userName if user wants to remove themselves
        authPassword -
        Returns:
        true if user has been removed, else false
